title: Are there any living members of Elvis Presley's original Memphis Mafia members still alive in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as actual mafia members, discounting his musicians, Jerry Schilling is the only living member of Elvis’ “mafia”. Presley and Schilling met on Sunday, July 11, 1954. Schilling was only 12 years old and was invited by Red West to join him, Presley, and others in a football game. Presley was the quarterback and threw a pass at Schilling. Since it was such a good catch, Schilling was invited back to play games every Sunday for a couple of years until Presley was too busy traveling to be able to play. A couple of years later, Schilling paid a visit to Presley and rekindled their friendship. Not long after, Presley asked Schilling to join his entourage, which came to be known as the "Memphis Mafia", and he agreed. A couple of hours later, they were ready to hit the road.

Wednesday, September 16, 2020. The Question: Are there any living members of Elvis Presley's original Memphis Mafia members still alive in 2020? bR’s Answer: The Following link will give you the answer. Memphis Mafia - Wikipedia Hope This Helps.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Mark Thomas Carr

response.answer_text: JERRY SCHILLING is still amoung the living.
